a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in COâ‚‚ emissions and GDP, World
Consumption-based emissions are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures fossil fuel
and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Note: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) figures are adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Global Carbon Project; World Bank
